meanings.definition: Engaged in a physical battle or conflict.
meanings.sent1: The knights wore their foughten armor into the fierce battle.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers returned victorious from the foughten war.
meanings.sent3: The cats had a playful foughten skirmish over a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds and the sun had a foughten battle for dominance in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dragon in the story was so vividly foughten.

meanings.sent1: The foughten hero emerged from the final battle weary but triumphant.
meanings.sent2: The foughten warriors stood proudly after their hard-won victory.
meanings.sent3: The cake was a foughten masterpiece, decorated with intricate designs.
meanings.sent4: The colors in the painting seemed to be in a foughten struggle for attention.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the foughten argument lingered in the room.
